alert.note: Alert for Heard; Troup (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 12 at 6:35PM EDT until August 12 at 7:15PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: The National Weather Service in Peachtree City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Heard County in west central Georgia... Troup County in west central Georgia... * Until 715 PM EDT. * At 635 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Glenn, or 9 miles northeast of Stroud, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... LaGrange, Franklin, West Point, Hogansville, Corinth, Mountville, Cannonville, Louise, Rocky Point, Piedmont Heights, Harrisonville, Hillcrest, Big Springs, Wares Crossroads, Glenn, State Line Park, Abbottsford, Waresville, Frolona, and Texas. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. If you see wind damage...hail or flooding...wait until the storm has passed...and then call the National Weather Service toll free at 1 8 6 6 7 6 3 4 4 6 6 or tweet us your report at NWSATLANTA.
